trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA303_00735_SEQ_00<tab>Gegeroon of Memeroon's Trading Post has deliveries that need to be made.

TEXT_GAIUSA303_00735_SEQ_01<tab>Gegeroon of Memeroon's Trading Post has a delivery to make, but not enough time to do it himself. Help him out and deliver a hot box lunch to Tanga Tonga in his cabin at Thalaos.
TEXT_GAIUSA303_00735_SEQ_02<tab>Tanga Tonga is immensely pleased to receive his little bag full of toast and egg products. Fully sated, he can now focus on his research.
TEXT_GAIUSA303_00735_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the hot box lunch to Tanga Tonga.
TEXT_GAIUSA303_00735_GEGEROON_000_000<tab>Gegeroon has good goods. Good goods need delivery. But Gegeroon busy. Too, too busy.
TEXT_GAIUSA303_00735_GEGEROON_000_001<tab>Have hot box lunch. Qiqirn hot box lunch. Lunch for Tanga Tonga. Tanga Tonga in Thalaos. You take for Gegeroon!
TEXT_GAIUSA303_00735_TANGATOTUNGA_000_010<tab>Leave me be. I'm too hungry to continue my research, let alone receive visitors.

TEXT_GAIUSA303_00735_TANGATOTUNGA_000_011<tab>This... This is a Qiqirn hot box lunch from Memeroon's Trading Post! H-How did you...? Thank you, friend! At last, I will be able to hear myself think over the growling of my stomach.

TEXT_GAIUSA303_00735_TANGATOTUNGA_000_012<tab>I was so eager to come study the fossils, I never gave any thought to how I'd take my meals. I've neither the time nor the materials to cook on my own, so the trading post has been a godssend. I'm always happy to be on the receiving end of a nice, hot box lunch!
